tooltips.run: Execute the machine automatically with current speed
tooltips.nextStep: Execute only one step of the Turing machine
tooltips.resetTape: Reset tape with initial input and reset machine state
tooltips.loadMachine: Load Turing machine definition with initial tape
tooltips.resetTapeInput: Reset only the tape keeping the machine loaded

messages.loadMachineFirst: Please load a Turing Machine first.
messages.loadAndResetFirst: Please load and reset a Turing Machine first.
messages.machineNotLoadedOrStopped: Machine not loaded or already stopped/error. Reset the tape.

errors.invalidCharacterInTape: Error: Character '{{char}}' at position {{position}} of the tape is not in the alphabet. Allowed alphabet: [{{alphabet}}].
errors.noTransitionForState: Error: No transition defined for state '{{state}}'.
errors.noTransitionForSymbol: Error: No transition for state '{{state}}' reading '{{symbol}}'.

tape.invalidCharacter: Character '{{char}}' at position {{position}} of the tape is not in the alphabet. Allowed alphabet: [{{alphabet}}].

definition.mustBeObject: Definition must be a valid JSON object.
definition.missingFields: Invalid Turing Machine definition. Required fields are missing.
definition.initialStateNotFound: Initial state '{{state}}' not found in the states list.
definition.invalidAlphabetSymbol: Alphabet symbol '{{symbol}}' must be a string of exactly 1 character.
definition.invalidBlankSymbol: Blank symbol '{{blank}}' must be a string of exactly 1 character.
definition.noFinalStates: There must be at least one final state.
definition.finalStateNotFound: Final state '{{state}}' not found in the states list.
definition.transitionStateNotInList: State '{{state}}' in transitions is not in the defined states list.
definition.transitionsMustBeArray: Transitions for state '{{state}}' must be an array.
definition.invalidReadSymbol: Read symbol '{{symbol}}' in transition from state '{{state}}' must be a string of exactly 1 character.
definition.readSymbolNotInAlphabet: Transition in state '{{state}}' reads '{{symbol}}' which is not in the alphabet or the blank symbol.
definition.invalidWriteSymbol: Write symbol '{{symbol}}' in transition from state '{{state}}' must be a string of exactly 1 character.
definition.writeSymbolNotInAlphabet: Transition in state '{{state}}' writes '{{symbol}}' which is not in the alphabet or the blank symbol.
definition.invalidAction: Transition in state '{{state}}' has invalid action '{{action}}'. Must be 'LEFT' or 'RIGHT'.
definition.unknownToState: Transition in state '{{state}}' goes to an unknown state '{{toState}}'.
definition.missingTransitions: The following non-final states do not have defined transitions: {{states}}.
definition.extraTransitions: Transitions have states that are not non-final states: {{states}}.

github.description: from 42. Visualize and run Turing Machines interactively!
github.footer: ⭐ Liked the project? Leave a star on GitHub! Contributions are very welcome.

stateMachine.title: State Machine Visualization
stateMachine.instructions: Drag states to reorganize the diagram. Use the mouse wheel to zoom in/out. Transitions are shown as: input/output, movement

machineGraph.loadMachine: Load a machine to visualize the graph
machineGraph.title: ReactFlow Visualization - {{name}}
machineGraph.instructions: Drag states to reorganize the diagram. Use the controls to navigate.
